jobDescription: Reporting/Data Analyst SumBridge West Seattle, WASumBridge is hiring an experienced Reporting Analyst to join our client in a permanent, full-time opening on their team. The Reporting Analyst is responsible for reporting on data and information to help business units guide decision making for the organization. The Reporting Analyst develops reports, writes and tests SQL queries, creates documentation, and trains users in running reports. This positions requires excellent communication skills in working with stakeholders to understand reporting requirements to meet business needs. Candidate Qualities:
